Description:
Builds and maintains application server compatible with Windows and report to Applications Supervisor.
Ensures the efficient operation of production systems including database, application and web servers.
Establishes job automation using scripts and other tools.
Ensure proper backup coverage and monitor backup quality with documented test restorations.
Monitors system and application availability and performance information.
Maintain operating system and application current patch levels on all servers
Collaborates with hardware, OS, database administrators technical teams to ensure proper integration of the environment
Provides technical support to web designers and developers to assist in operating server technologies.
Develops work plans and track/report status of assigned projects/tasks
Troubleshoot and perform Root Cause Analysis of basic software issues
Responds to requests received by help desk in timely manner.
Provides support in Quality Assurance testing and testing of recovery plans.Skills
Skills:
Proven experience as a .NET Developer or Application Developer
Familiarity with the ASP.NET framework, SQL Server and design/architectural patterns (e.g. Model-View-Controller (MVC))
Excellent troubleshooting and communication skills
